segments.text: Now we will listen to the speech of the Mother Goddess Nirmala Devi,
who has done this in Pune on the occasion of Ma Shivratri.
This speech was done on the morning of the 25th February, 1991.
Shivansha Mahatma is going to come.
We should understand that.
Brahmadeva had created this universe.
And that universe has been created by the human being.
And if we do not have the power of the universe,
then we have to worship the Lord.
Finally, we have to worship the Lord.
We have to worship the Lord.
We have to worship the Lord.
Shivatattva means our soul.
All these things, all these things,
are there to be used to make that essence.
That is, the first essence is Shivatattva.
It is the essence of the universe.
It is always there.
And from that essence, the human being is created.
Now the human being should know that essence.
The one who had the desire to create this,
the human being should create it.
And that human being should worship the Lord.
His power should be increased.
And the joy of his power should be in his work.
His consciousness should be in the human being.
And his desire should be brought out of this universe.
If you have been able to understand the essence of the universe,
then you have understood the essence of Shivatattva.
That Shivatattva is there.
We call it the consciousness of the universe.
This is what has happened.
Shivani, our power is the power of the universe.
We call it the power of the great dark.
A small portion of that is created by the Kundalini.
It is in every human being.
And in the three ways, the six chakras,
the two are called Shivatattva.
This is the essence of Shivatattva.
The ocean of the universe, the ocean of the power,
the ocean of love, all these are the essence of love.
When Shivani goes, it is true.
And that is the ocean of bliss.
There is bliss in it.
It is a very easy task to make Shivani happy.
He is a great person.
He is the Lord who is the main God of love.
It is a very easy task.
His consciousness is not above.
I am below.
He does not see everything through the eyes.
He sees only what is at the feet of the one who is at the feet.
It is very easy.
Even the raksha made Shivani happy.
He does not want to make Shivani angry.
He is not angry.
He is not angry.
He is angry with the school, with the Lord, with the Lord.
That is all.
Thank you very much.
I have done my best.
I have said that Shivani has awakened us a little.
And Shivani has made Shivani happy.
Even if we do something, our existence cannot be easily destroyed.
I think that is what I am thinking.
Today, in our prayer, you ask Shivani to open your eyes.
Open your third eye.
And look at those eyes.
All these raksha's should be closed.
Devotees have been troubled and they have been trying.
And now the devotees have come to the same state where they have the right to be Shivani.
If you have made such a prayer to Shivani, today is a very big day.
That Shiv Tattva will give you a very big blessing.
And that blessing will make the world and the whole world very happy.
We have the right to ask for this blessing and to wish for it.
So ask for this blessing today.
Even about your own Shiv Tattva, you should ask the Lord today.
Shiv Tattva means the essence of the soul.
It is very pure, unbounded, and it is eternal.
The person's attention that is on the soul, his progress is very high.
The soul is in the inner state.
Usually, one should worship the soul.
One should focus on the soul, that is, the attention that is on the outside is lost.
Everything outside is false.
The essence of the soul is the ego of Shiva.
When we are going to get Shiva, there is nothing.
We have to get that.
We have to know that.
We have to remain in that.
From that we have to look at the world.
We should look outside from the soul.
We should ask the Lord about ourselves.
So slowly, the outside world will be released.
You will get into the essence.
The essence will be released.
The essence is not related to anything.
It is eternal, unbounded.
And then the relationship is the bliss of bliss.
That bliss has no difference.
For that, don't show anything to others.
We have to leave this and that.
It is released from the inside.
And our mind is on the essence.
It is completely united.
We all have to be like that.
This is our blessing.
Today, we have to worship Shiva with great humility.
And the most important thing in that is to get the relationship that is important to you.
And you will get that.
I am completely hopeful.
What can be done?
First, we have to remain pure.
After being pure, the second thing is the Kundalini.
I have just said that the Kundalini is the one that has been established by Sadashiva.
That is Kundalini.
That is Mahakali Shakti.
Mahakali Shakti is where the powers leave after the other.
Then first, Mahakali Shakti.
And its something called Aanchha Matra.
This is Kundalini Shakti.
And it is sitting in a triangle.
It is a divine form.
It is still pure.
It is married but it is still a princess waiting for her husband.
This is the Kundalini of that form.
And to save that Kundalini, Ganesh has prepared it.
Now we have called Gauri Chamanje Kanya.
And after that, which path should she take?
She has to take the path of Mahalakshmi, the path of Sushumna.
And she took the path of Sushumna because she met Sadashiva in the feet of Sadashiva.
That is, the Lord Shiva who is in the heart, that was content.
He was content, he was enlightened, he was enlightened.
That is when our union happens.
When first, before reaching Shiva, we should have taken the path of Mahalakshmi.
So now we should call Mahalakshmi.
After Mahalakshmi's call, we will come to the Lord Shiva.
And this is the Kundalini door.
And Kundalini is the power of Lord Shiva.
This is the power of Lord Shiva.
That means it is the power of Mahakali.
And it is sitting in a triangle.
But that power of Lord Shiva,
after Mahalakshmi's call,
it goes up and gets Shiva.
That is how it is.
That means, always,
whether Lord Shiva or Mahalakshmi should do the worship of Parvati,
or Lord Shiva has always given a boon,
and always, Vishnu has done his worship,
then we should take into account how much of Lord Shiva is above.
Did you understand?
Yes, and innocence on this earth.
Then we worshiped Gauri, that is the Kundalini,
because through Kundalini only we get to our ascent.
Kundalini is the power, residual power of the Mahakali.
And it is settled in the triangular bone, as you know,
and is worshipped as a kanya,
because though she is married, yet she is a virgin,
so she is worshipped there.
After that, the Kundalini has to rise
through the central path of Sushumna,
which is guarded and nurtured by Mahalakshmi.
So we have to worship Mahalakshmi's force.
That's how we worship Her.
Through the Mahalakshmi we prepare the path for Kundalini to cross over.
When the Kundalini crosses the Mahalakshmi path,
it comes up to the Sahastrara and breaks the Brahmarandra,
becoming one with the all-pervading power of Shiva-tattva.
Because Sadashiva is on our fontanel bone,
His legs are resting on our fontanel bone area.
When the Kundalini touches His feet,
then the Shiva-tattva in our heart,
which is the Spirit, is enlightened,
and we get the enlightenment.
This is the yoga which we achieve through our Sahaja system.
And that is why we have now worshipped the Mahalakshmi.
After that now we have to invite,
avahan as they call it, innovation,
invite the deity of Shiva and Parvati,
and then we have to put our hearts to pour its love,
which is called as abhisheka, through the symbol of water.
The water container is like a heart,
which pours the water all the time on the feet,
showing that it is our heart which is pouring our love on Shiva,
by which we bring Him over and call Him, invite Him.
And after that we will give Him what He likes the most,
is the Bela Patra, which is a leaf which has got three leaves on one stem,
which means His three powers, three gunatmika, three powers.
So with our three powers, our three gunas, our three powers,
we surrender ourselves to Shiva, and by that we show that
we give our three gunas to you so that we become gunatir.
This is what is the Shiva puja.
May God bless you.
